tool_description: Storing scores of Hungry Hole project
title: Scores

api_list.name: setScores
getScores
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://scores.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "scores.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
